example: in situ Hi-C on HFFc6 cells.HFFc6.protocol variations.Dekker
in situ Hi-C on HCT116 cells (containing AID-tagged WAPL) untreated.HCT116
in situ Dnase Hi-C on RUES2 cells differentiated to cardiomyocytes.RUES2_Stem cells

props.title: ConnectionExplorer: Find connections between CFDE DD KG entities
props.description: Select a CFDE DD KG entity to find other entities connected to it or explore connections between two CFDE DD KG entities.

props.title: Data Distillery Apps
props.description: Explore Data Distillery data with these apps

props.title: Tissue2Drugs
props.description: Find all genes that are highly expressed in a GTEx tissue and may be perturbed by a specific compound based on data from the LINCS L1000 dataset, and are known drug targets based on data curated by IDG.

props.title: MW2Disease
props.description: For a specific disease in Metabolomics Workbench, find all IDG and GTEx assertions that may be related to the disease in a specific tissue type.

props.title: EnzymeMiner
props.description: Select a drug processing enzyme to view drugs that up or down regulate it from LINCS as well as tissues where it is highly expressed based on data from GTEx.

props.title: Liquid Biopsy of Condition
props.description: For a given set of genes that are highly expressed in a specific disease, identify extracellular RNAs (exRNAs) that may be detected in human biofluids and thus serve as non-invasive disease biomarkers.

props.title: Liquid Biopsy of Drug Response
props.description: For a given drug term, return (1) up-regulated genes, (2) loci expressed in exRNA that overlap RBP binding regions, (3) the RBP that overlaps the locus, and (4) the biofluid(s) where locus was expressed in exRNA.

props.title: Data Distillery Use Case
props.description: Explore use cases that use distilled data from Common Fund Programs

props.title: Breast Epitheliumn Use Case
props.description: Find the genes that are highly expressed in breast epithelium as well as drugs that target these genes.

props.title: Mild Cognitive Impairment Use Case
props.description: Find all IDG and GTEx assertions that may be related to mild cognitive impairment and any tissue type.

props.title: CES1 Use Case
props.description: Display drugs that up or down regulate the gene CES1 from LINCS as well as tissues where it is highly expressed based on assertions from GTEx.

props.title: Frontotemporal Dementia Use Case
props.description: For genes that are correlated with frontotemporal dementia, identify extracellular RNAs (exRNAs) that may be detected in human biofluids and thus serve as non-invasive disease biomarkers.

props.title: Liquid Biopsy of Dexamethasone Response
props.description: Find genes that are up-regulated by dexamethasone, (2) loci expressed in exRNA that overlap RBP binding regions, (3) the RBP that overlaps the locus, and (4) the biofluid(s) where locus was expressed in exRNA.
